name: Animal Farm: Chapter 1
description:
At last, the best game ever created based on the first chapter of Animal Farm is NOW AVAILABLE!

Join Napoleon and all of his wacky barnyard friends as they set the stage for the next chapter of Animal Farm. Animal Farm: Chapter One is a satirical game that answers all the questions you never had about the story you read in school because it was only about 100 pages.

In this game, you'll collect apples, shoot billboard trolls and kill rats all in the name of plotline advancement. No game has ever been so directly influenced by the first chapter of Animal farm.

So use your trotters and purchase this game now!

"You'll go hog wild for this game!"
- Napoleon
